001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import static io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.findProviders;
004
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.Collection;
007import java.util.EnumSet;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Locale;
010import java.util.ServiceLoader;
011import java.util.Set;
012import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;
013import java.util.function.Consumer;
014
015import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
016
017import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LevelResolver.LevelConfig;
018import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig.ChangePublisher;
019import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.Property;
020import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.PropertyGetter;
021import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.PropertyGetter.RequiredPropertyGetter;
022import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
023import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator;
024import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.PropertiesProvider;
025
026/**
027 * The configuration of a RainbowGum. In some other logging implementations this is called
028 * "context".
029 */
030public sealed interface LogConfig {
031
032        /**
033         * String key value properties.
034         * @return properties.
035         */
036        public LogProperties properties();
037
038        /**
039         * Level resolver for resolving levels from logger names.
040         * @return level resolver.
041         */
042        public LevelConfig levelResolver();
043
044        /**
045         * Output provider that uses URI to find output.
046         * @return output provider.
047         */
048        public LogOutputRegistry outputRegistry();
049
050        /**
051         * Provides encoders by URI scheme.
052         * @return encoder registry.
053         */
054        public LogEncoderRegistry encoderRegistry();
055
056        /**
057         * Provides publishers by URI scheme.
058         * @return changePublisher registry.
059         */
060        public LogPublisherRegistry publisherRegistry();
061
062        /**
063         * Creates a builder for making LogConfig.
064         * @return builder.
065         */
066        public static Builder builder() {
067                return new Builder();
068        }
069
070        /**
071         * An event changePublisher to publish configuration changes.
072         * @return changePublisher.
073         */
074        public ChangePublisher changePublisher();
075
076        /**
077         * Service registry are custom services needed by plugins particularly during the
078         * initialization process.
079         * @return registry.
080         */
081        public ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry();
082
083        /**
084         * A factory that may need config to provide.
085         *
086         * @param <T> component
087         */
088        @FunctionalInterface
089        public interface Provider<T> {
090
091                /*
092                 * TODO maybe make this sealed with sub provider types?
093                 */
094
095                /**
096                 * Creates the component from config. The component is not always guaranteed to be
097                 * new object.
098                 * @param name config name of the parent component.
099                 * @param config config.
100                 * @return component.
101                 */
102                T provide(String name, LogConfig config);
103
104                /**
105                 * Convenience for flattening nullable providers.
106                 * @param <U> component
107                 * @param name name of parent component and can be ignored if not needed.
108                 * @param provider nullable provider
109                 * @param config config used to provide if not null.
110                 * @return maybe null component.
111                 */
112                @SuppressWarnings("exports")
113                public static <U> @Nullable U provideOrNull(String name, @Nullable Provider<U> provider, LogConfig config) {
114                        if (provider == null) {
115                                return null;
116                        }
117                        return provider.provide(name, config);
118                }
119
120                /**
121                 * Creates a provider of instance that is already configured.
122                 * @param <U> component
123                 * @param instance component instance.
124                 * @return this.
125                 */
126                public static <U> Provider<U> of(U instance) {
127                        return (n, c) -> instance;
128                }
129
130        }
131
132        /**
133         * Config Change Publisher. By default this is enabled with
134         * {@value LogProperties#GLOBAL_CHANGE_PROPERTY} set to <code>true</code> and then
135         * configuring which "logger" prefix will be allowed to change with
136         * {@value LogProperties#CHANGE_PREFIX} + {@value LogProperties#SEP} + logger name set
137         * to a list of {@link ChangeType} or <code>true</code>/<code>false</code> to enable
138         * or disable all changes.
139         */
140        interface ChangePublisher {
141
142                /**
143                 * Subscribe to changes.
144                 * @param consumer consumer.
145                 */
146                public void subscribe(Consumer<? super LogConfig> consumer);
147
148                /**
149                 * Publish that there has been changes.
150                 */
151                public void publish();
152
153                /**
154                 * Test to see if <strong>any</strong> changes are enabled for a logger.
155                 * @param loggerName logger name.
156                 * @return true if enabled.
157                 */
158                public boolean isEnabled(String loggerName);
159
160                /**
161                 * Returns what the logger is allowed to change.
162                 * @param loggerName logger name.
163                 * @return which things are allowed to change in the logger
164                 */
165                public Set<ChangeType> allowedChanges(String loggerName);
166
167                /**
168                 * Changing type options.
169                 */
170                public enum ChangeType {
171
172                        /**
173                         * The logger is allowed to change levels.
174                         */
175                        LEVEL,
176                        /**
177                         * The logger is allowed to change caller info.
178                         */
179                        CALLER;
180
181                        static Set<ChangeType> parse(List<String> value) {
182                                if (value.isEmpty()) {
183                                        return Set.of();
184                                }
185                                var s = EnumSet.noneOf(ChangeType.class);
186                                for (var v : value) {
187                                        if (v.equalsIgnoreCase("true")) {
188                                                return EnumSet.allOf(ChangeType.class);
189                                        }
190                                        if (v.equalsIgnoreCase("false")) {
191                                                return EnumSet.noneOf(ChangeType.class);
192                                        }
193                                        s.add(ChangeType.parse(v));
194                                }
195                                return s;
196                        }
197
198                        static ChangeType parse(String value) {
199                                String v = value.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT);
200                                return ChangeType.valueOf(v);
201                        }
202
203                }
204
205        }
206
207        /**
208         * Builder for LogConfig.
209         * <p>
210         * <strong>NOTE:</strong> The service loader is not used by default with this builder.
211         * If the automatic discovery of components is desired call
212         * {@link #serviceLoader(ServiceLoader)}.
213         */
214        public static final class Builder extends LevelResolver.AbstractBuilder<Builder> {
215
216                private @Nullable ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry;
217
218                private @Nullable LogProperties logProperties;
219
220                private @Nullable ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> serviceLoader;
221
222                private final List<RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator> configurators = new ArrayList<>();
223
224                /**
225                 * Default constructor
226                 */
227                private Builder() {
228                }
229
230                /**
231                 * Sets log properties
232                 * @param logProperties log properties.
233                 * @return this.
234                 */
235                public Builder properties(LogProperties logProperties) {
236                        this.logProperties = logProperties;
237                        return this;
238                }
239
240                /**
241                 * Sets service registry
242                 * @param serviceRegistry service registry.
243                 * @return this.
244                 */
245                public Builder serviceRegistry(ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry) {
246                        this.serviceRegistry = serviceRegistry;
247                        return this;
248                }
249
250                /**
251                 * Add to configure LogConfig and ServiceRegistry.
252                 * @param configurator will run on build.
253                 * @return this.
254                 */
255                public Builder configurator(RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator configurator) {
256                        configurators.add(configurator);
257                        return this;
258                }
259
260                /**
261                 * Sets the service loader to use for loading components that were not set.
262                 * @param serviceLoader loader to use for missing components.
263                 * @return this.
264                 */
265                public Builder serviceLoader(ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> serviceLoader) {
266                        this.serviceLoader = serviceLoader;
267                        return this;
268                }
269
270                /**
271                 * Sets a default service loader to use for loading components that were not set.
272                 * This call will just call the {@link ServiceLoader} without providing a class
273                 * loader.
274                 * @return this.
275                 */
276                public Builder serviceLoader() {
277                        return this.serviceLoader(ServiceLoader.load(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class));
278                }
279
280                /**
281                 * Configures the builder with a function for ergonomics.
282                 * @param consumer passed the builder.
283                 * @return this.
284                 */
285                public Builder with(Consumer<? super Builder> consumer) {
286                        consumer.accept(this);
287                        return this;
288                }
289
290                /**
291                 * Builds LogConfig which will use the {@link ServiceLoader} if set to load
292                 * missing components and if not set will use static defaults.
293                 * @return log config
294                 */
295                public LogConfig build() {
296                        ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry = this.serviceRegistry;
297                        LogProperties logProperties = this.logProperties;
298
299                        var serviceLoader = this.serviceLoader;
300                        var configurators = this.configurators;
301                        if (serviceRegistry == null) {
302                                serviceRegistry = ServiceRegistry.of();
303                        }
304                        if (logProperties == null) {
305                                if (serviceLoader != null) {
306                                        logProperties = provideProperties(serviceRegistry, serviceLoader);
307                                }
308                                else {
309                                        logProperties = LogProperties.StandardProperties.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES;
310                                }
311                        }
312                        var levelResolver = this.buildGlobalResolver(logProperties);
313                        var config = new DefaultLogConfig(serviceRegistry, logProperties, levelResolver);
314                        if (configurators.isEmpty() && serviceLoader != null) {
315                                configurators = findProviders(serviceLoader, Configurator.class).toList();
316                        }
317                        if (!configurators.isEmpty()) {
318                                RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator.runConfigurators(configurators.stream(), config);
319                        }
320                        return config;
321                }
322
323                LevelConfig buildGlobalResolver(LogProperties logProperties) {
324                        LevelConfig levelResolver = ConfigLevelResolver.of(logProperties);
325                        var config = buildLevelConfigOrNull();
326                        if (config != null) {
327                                return LevelConfig.of(List.<LevelConfig>of(config, levelResolver));
328                        }
329                        return levelResolver;
330                }
331
332                private static LogProperties provideProperties(ServiceRegistry registry,
333                                ServiceLoader<RainbowGumServiceProvider> loader) {
334                        List<LogProperties> props = findProviders(loader, PropertiesProvider.class)
335                                .flatMap(s -> s.provideProperties(registry).stream())
336                                .toList();
337                        return LogProperties.of(props, LogProperties.StandardProperties.SYSTEM_PROPERTIES);
338                }
339
340                @Override
341                protected Builder self() {
342                        return this;
343                }
344
345        }
346
347}
348
349abstract class AbstractChangePublisher implements ChangePublisher {
350
351        static final RequiredPropertyGetter<Set<ChangeType>> changeSetting = PropertyGetter.of()
352                .withSearch(LogProperties.CHANGE_PREFIX)
353                .toList()
354                .map(s -> ChangeType.parse(s))
355                .orElse(Set.of());
356
357        private final Collection<Consumer<? super LogConfig>> consumers = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<Consumer<? super LogConfig>>();
358
359        protected abstract LogConfig reload();
360
361        protected abstract LogConfig config();
362
363        @Override
364        public void publish() {
365                LogConfig config = reload();
366                for (var c : consumers) {
367                        c.accept(config);
368                }
369        }
370
371        @Override
372        public void subscribe(Consumer<? super LogConfig> consumer) {
373                consumers.add(consumer);
374        }
375
376        @Override
377        public boolean isEnabled(String loggerName) {
378                return !allowedChanges(loggerName).isEmpty();
379        }
380
381        @Override
382        public Set<ChangeType> allowedChanges(String loggerName) {
383                return changeSetting.get(config().properties(), loggerName).value();
384        }
385
386}
387
388enum IgnoreChangePublisher implements ChangePublisher {
389
390        INSTANT;
391
392        @Override
393        public void subscribe(Consumer<? super LogConfig> consumer) {
394        }
395
396        @Override
397        public void publish() {
398
399        }
400
401        @Override
402        public boolean isEnabled(String loggerName) {
403                return false;
404        }
405
406        @Override
407        public Set<ChangeType> allowedChanges(String loggerName) {
408                return Set.of();
409        }
410
411}
412
413final class DefaultLogConfig implements LogConfig {
414
415        private final ServiceRegistry registry;
416
417        private final LogProperties properties;
418
419        private final LevelConfig levelResolver;
420
421        private final ChangePublisher changePublisher;
422
423        private final LogOutputRegistry outputRegistry;
424
425        private final LogEncoderRegistry encoderRegistry;
426
427        private final LogPublisherRegistry publisherRegistry;
428
429        public DefaultLogConfig(ServiceRegistry registry, LogProperties properties, LevelConfig levelResolver) {
430                super();
431                this.registry = registry;
432                this.properties = properties;
433                this.levelResolver = levelResolver;
434                boolean changeable = Property.builder() //
435                        .toBoolean()
436                        .orElse(false)
437                        .build(LogProperties.GLOBAL_CHANGE_PROPERTY)
438                        .get(properties)
439                        .value();
440                this.changePublisher = changeable ? new DefaultChangePublisher() : IgnoreChangePublisher.INSTANT;
441                this.outputRegistry = LogOutputRegistry.of();
442                this.encoderRegistry = LogEncoderRegistry.of();
443                this.publisherRegistry = LogPublisherRegistry.of();
444        }
445
446        class DefaultChangePublisher extends AbstractChangePublisher {
447
448                @Override
449                protected LogConfig config() {
450                        return DefaultLogConfig.this;
451                }
452
453                @Override
454                protected LogConfig reload() {
455                        levelResolver.clear();
456                        return DefaultLogConfig.this;
457                }
458
459        }
460
461        @Override
462        public LogProperties properties() {
463                return properties;
464        }
465
466        @Override
467        public LevelConfig levelResolver() {
468                return this.levelResolver;
469        }
470
471        @Override
472        public ServiceRegistry serviceRegistry() {
473                return this.registry;
474        }
475
476        @Override
477        public ChangePublisher changePublisher() {
478                return this.changePublisher;
479        }
480
481        @Override
482        public LogOutputRegistry outputRegistry() {
483                return this.outputRegistry;
484        }
485
486        @Override
487        public LogEncoderRegistry encoderRegistry() {
488                return this.encoderRegistry;
489        }
490
491        @Override
492        public LogPublisherRegistry publisherRegistry() {
493                return this.publisherRegistry;
494        }
495
496}
